mapper.select: select m.MENU_CODE as menuCode , m.MENU_NAME as menuName , m.PARENT_MENU_CODE as parentMenuCode , m.URL as url , e.POSITION_CODE as positionCode FROM MENU m , EMPLOYEE e , MENU_AVAILABLE_BY_POSITION mv WHERE e.DEPT_CODE = mv.DEPT_CODE AND e.POSITION_CODE = mv.POSITION_CODE AND mv.MENU_CODE = m.MENU_CODE AND e.EMP_CODE = #{deptCode} ORDER BY m.MENU_CODE
SELECT * FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_CODE

SELECT AUTHORITY_NAME as menuName FROM (SELECT DISTINCT AUTHORITY_NAME FROM AUTHORITY_MENU AM, (SELECT * FROM AUTHORITY_GROUP A,MENU_USE_POSITION M WHERE A.AUTHORITY_GROUP_CODE=M.AUTHORITY_GROUP_CODE AND DEPT_CODE= #{deptCode} AND AUTHORITY_GROUP=1 AND AUTHORITY=1)WC WHERE AM.AUTHORITY_CODE=WC.WORKPLACE_CODE)
